targets.expr: sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state="healthy", job=~"$job", upstream=~"$upstream"}) by (job, route, upstream, target, address) * -1  + sum(kong_upstream_target_health{state=~"(unhealthy|dns_error)", job=~"$job", upstream=~"$upstream"}) by (job, route, upstream, target, address)
sum(kong_nginx_connections_total{state=~"total|accepted|active|reading|writing|waiting", instance=~"$instance"}) by (job, instance, service, state, subsystem)

panels.title: Kong shared memory usage by Node ($instance) ($job)
Bandwidth by Route and Direction Ingress
Bandwidth by Route and Direction Egress

targets.expr: sum(irate(kong_bandwidth_bytes{instance=~"$instance", job=~"$job", service=~"$service", route=~"$route", route=~"$route"}[1m])) by (instance, job, service, route, direction)
